ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Race to 60 (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... friend) ... you ... YUP dat wuz us ;)  We had a blast doing it too.  But we did it in fun, during _beta_ and it showed the GM s a basic flaw in the name
ygData.messageBody:
> > Lol, who cares, either way he didn't really earn 60. He
> > "cheated" to get
> > it. Not cheated as in broke any rules but definitely cheated
> > the system to
> > get ahead of it. I refuse to congratulate, hold in awe, or
> > respect someone
> > that finds pleasure in cheating the system.
>
> Maybe I've got the wrong person, but weren't you the one who (with a
friend)
> created characters called Banker and Teller a while back? If that was
you
> than consider this an official ribbing, a busing of your @$$, a pi$$ take,
> and an attempt at levity. (Anything but a flame.)

YUP dat wuz us ;) We had a blast doing it too. But we did it in fun,
during _beta_ and it showed the GM's a basic flaw in the name filter
(Banker, Teller and a few other permutations were added to the name filter
shortly after our little escapade ;) And we had a LOT of fun doing it. :)
The characters were a joke since the GM's made us delete the characters
anyway ;)

> > Glad he's 60.
>
> Me too, because where can he go from there but Asheron's Call?
>
> > Not saying
> > this is a BAD
> > thing, just that it isn't my style and that I don't respect
> > someone for how
> > fast they can hit 60 ;)
>
> Heh. I dinged 11 last night. For giggles I hit /played and found out my
> bard's birthday was May 5th. That's almost a level a month! Woohoo!
And
> it only took me 6 days of playing time to do it. I think I deserve a
> cookie.
>
> Peace
> Evulia, needlessly sarcastic bard of 11 songs, Tunare

WOW and I thought that my best friend spent a lot of time roleplaying with
44days played at 20th... hehe and she spends HOURS just frittering time away
talking to folks ;) She loves the social aspect of the game. I keep trying
to tell her this isn't MiRC but she loves to chat :)

Kudos on 11th! Have you tried the all-instrument twist of
Hymn/Disonnance/Warsong? (punching of course)

I think you'll find it quite effective ;) And it's always nice to get that
Hand to Hand skill maxed for CR's in dungeons ;)

Kev
